title: Skillful Parenting
description: A holistic program that reinforces positive parenting practices, empowering caregivers to promote child well-being, strengthen family relationships, and reduce stress through peer-group discussions.

title: Financial Literacy and Economic Empowerment
description: Equips families with practical financial knowledge, focusing on budgeting, debt management, savings, and improving financial communication within households.

title: Youth Empowerment
description: Prepares young people for the future by developing leadership, career, and life skills, promoting confidence and resilience.

title: Ending Violence against Women & Girls (VAWG)
description: Raises awareness, empowers women and girls, and engages communities in preventing and addressing gender-based violence.
